title: 皮肤更换
author: YOONaa
txt_content: 一般的服务器怎么导入皮肤，求问

replies.author: 粘兽
replies.txt_content:
给客户端装上这个模组
就可以读取大部分皮肤站的皮肤了

[1.15.1-1.6.4][CustomSkinLoader——万用皮肤补丁][开源]所有皮肤站+正版皮肤+高清
https://www.mcbbs.net/thread-269807-1-1.html

replies.author: xmdhs
replies.txt_content:
服务器的话，可以用这两款插件
https://www.mcbbs.net/forum.php?mod=viewthread&tid=558061
https://www.mcbbs.net/forum.php?mod=viewthread&tid=884832

replies.author: US_Even
replies.txt_content: 去皮肤站内创号 找 或者在网易之类里 购买皮肤
